results.name: A127773 * A002260 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
comment: Row sums = squares of the triangular numbers, A000537: (1, 9, 36, 100, ...) A002260 * A127773 = A127778.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: T(n,k) = k*binomial(n+1,n-1) = Sum_{i=1..k} i*binomial(k,i)*binomial(n+2-k,n-i), 1 <= k <= n. - _Mircea Merca_, Apr 11 2012
